text: Hi Graeme, that sounds great. Is this a solo or group project? There are tonnes of great animation tools out there but not necessarily specific to film production. The ones I found most helpful besides my own scripts are available here <https://animbot.ca/home/>   and here <http://morganloomis.com/tools/>  you maybe have heard of these before? The yshould definitely help speeding up the animation process. :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Maike thanks so much for the helpful Links I have heard of animbot before I've never seen that page from Morgan Loomis before so Handy! The project that I am working on is a solo project, I would like to share with you the previz and could you tell me what you think? I would love to know your first impressions.  right now I am just rigging the characters getting them ready to animate :slightly_smiling_face:

Previz Link  <https://vimeo.com/manage/322803154/general>
